channel.title: How do i change the back ground of my 317 Demise client?
channel.description:
[b][font=courier]Hello Moparscaper's i was wondering how to change my 474 client to a diffrent back ground and i was wondering if some one could help me though it if you could tell me please leave a reaply thanks. Heres a pic to show your wat sort of client it is. [/font][/b]
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/1ifqcj.jpg[/img]

item.title: How do i change the back ground of my 317 Demise client?
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Look for Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java in your client files. Search for:

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage

It should show the current background and it’s location. For example mine says:

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./Files/Sprites/background.png");

Put whatever image you want to use into a file and set the directory to it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the back ground of my 317 Demise client?
